lead_paragraph: We believe that the American people were fully prepared for the President's statement in his radio address last night that the shooting war has started. In point of fact, it started many months ago. The date of its beginning was not the September day when Mr. Roosevelt ordered the Navy to shoot at sight on any German warship entering our defensive waters.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: AMER NATIONS AND WESTERN HEMISPHERE POSSESSIONS
